title: Dream On Me Lacy Portable 2-in-1 Bassinet & Cradle in Blue and White, Lightweight Baby Bassinet with Storage Basket, Adjustable and Removable Canopy
features: DUAL USE: Spacious and roomy, the Lacy is the ideal bassinet for your new born. And when LO needs soothing, rotate its wheels upwards to convert the Lacy into a rocking cradle. Use from birth till 25 lbs/until baby can push-up/roll over unassisted

ALWAYS HAVE LO CLOSE BY: The Lacy has a lightweight aluminium frame and comes with hooded locking caster wheels that allow you to push it easily from room to room. Lets you always have your child nearby, especially in the first few months

COMFORTABLE FABRIC: The bassinet is made of a polyester foam fabric that is soft and safe. Ruffles and frills give it a dreamy appeal. Choose from 8 single/two-tone and patterned finishes that blend easily with any nursery theme

FUNCTIONAL FEATURES: The handy storage basket below the bassinet allows you to keep baby essentials at hand. The Lacy features a multipurpose full canopy that is part mesh part fabric and also helps keeps bugs and insects at bay

SAFETY MATTERS: The Lacy Bassinet is JPMA certified to meet/exceed ASTM standards. Product specs are: 34Lx18Wx41.5H inches; it weighs 11 lbs. It includes the regulatory 1” thick inch mattress pad; dimensions are: 30Lx15Wx1H inches
description: Graceful and functional, the Lacy Portable 2 in 1 Bassinet is an indispensable asset for the early months of parenthood. Spacious and roomy, it also doubles up as a soothing rocking cradle - simply rotate its wheels upwards to convert it. What could be better than having a bassinet and cradle, all-in-one? Lacy has a lightweight aluminum frame and comes with hooded locking caster wheels. Light and portable, it allows you to always have LO nearby. The bassinet is made of a comfortable and safe polyester foam fabric. It boasts a dreamy design aesthetic thanks to ruffles and frills. Choose from 8 single/two-tone and patterned finishes that blend easily with any nursery theme. Keep all baby essentials handy in the large storage basket below the bassinet. The Lacy features a multipurpose full canopy that is part mesh part fabric and also helps keeps bugs and insects at bay. The Lacy Bassinet is JPMA certified to meet/exceed ASTM standards. Product specs are: 34Lx18Wx41.5H inches; it weighs 11 lbs. It includes the regulatory 1” thick inch mattress pad; dimensions are: 30Lx15Wx1H inches.Use from birth till 25 lbs/until baby can push-up/roll over unassisted.
